summary: Adds all perks and sets all skills to 100.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Need a new character?

Can't be bothered with all that leveling and grinding?

Then, boy are you in luck!


Only 5 years too late is my new batch file!

Simply download it with NMM or place into your Skyrim's dataÂ directory, then when you[/size] [size=4][color=#ffff00]start up your game, type "[/color][color=#ff7700]bat perks[/color][color=#ffff00]" to run it.[/color][/size]

[size=3]So, now save yourself all that grind time or tedious console entries, you filthy, filthy cheater/mod tester!

[/size]Also check out my Shout Batch file, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66361/?]here[/url].
author: ToxicBrown1
